plugin.name: debugutilsbad
plugin.description: Collection of elements that may or may not be useful for debugging

element.name: debugspy
element.description: DebugSpy provides information on buffers with bus messages
element.author: Guillaume Emont <gemont@igalia.com>

element.name: errorignore
element.longname: Convert some GstFlowReturn types into others
element.description: Pass through all packets but ignore some GstFlowReturn types
element.author: Vivia Nikolaidou <vivia@toolsonair.com>

element.name: fakevideosink
element.description: Fake video display that allow zero-copy
element.author: Nicolas Dufresne <nicolas.dufresne@collabora.com>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: video/x-raw(ANY), format=(string){ I420, YV12, YUY2, UYVY, AYUV, RGBx, BGRx, xRGB, xBGR, RGBA, BGRA, ARGB, ABGR, RGB, BGR, Y41B, Y42B, YVYU, Y444, v210, v216, NV12, NV21, GRAY8, GRAY16_BE, GRAY16_LE, v308, RGB16, BGR16, RGB15, BGR15, UYVP, A420, RGB8P, YUV9, YVU9, IYU1, ARGB64, AYUV64, r210, I420_10BE, I420_10LE, I422_10BE, I422_10LE, Y444_10BE, Y444_10LE, GBR, GBR_10BE, GBR_10LE, NV16, NV24, NV12_64Z32, A420_10BE, A420_10LE, A422_10BE, A422_10LE, A444_10BE, A444_10LE, NV61, P010_10BE, P010_10LE, IYU2, VYUY, GBRA, GBRA_10BE, GBRA_10LE, GBR_12BE, GBR_12LE, GBRA_12BE, GBRA_12LE, I420_12BE, I420_12LE, I422_12BE, I422_12LE, Y444_12BE, Y444_12LE, GRAY10_LE32, NV12_10LE32, NV16_10LE32 }, width=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], height=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], framerate=(fraction)[ 0/1, 2147483647/1 ]

element.name: fpsdisplaysink
element.longname: Measure and show framerate on videosink
element.description: Shows the current frame-rate and drop-rate of the videosink as overlay or text on stdout
element.author: Zeeshan Ali <zeeshan.ali@nokia.com>, Stefan Kost <stefan.kost@nokia.com>

element.name: watchdog
element.description: Watches for pauses in stream buffers
element.author: David Schleef <ds@schleef.org>
